dt: {bc}the quality or state of being true or real
{bc}something (such as a statement) that is true

dt.t: such eternal {it}verities{/it} as honor, love, and patriotism

dt: {bc}the quality or state of being truthful or honest

et: Middle English {it}verite{/it}, borrowed from Anglo-French {it}verité{/it}, borrowed from Latin {it}vēritāt-, vēritās{/it}, from {it}vērus{/it} "true" + {it}-itāt-, -itās{/it} {et_link|-ity|-ity} {ma}{mat|very:2|}{/ma}
shortdef: the quality or state of being true or real
something (such as a statement) that is true; especially : a fundamental and inevitably true value
the quality or state of being truthful or honest
